participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, often exploring the limits of his newfound powers.
participant_1.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i was born with my heart outside my body. i am a boy.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Energetic and enthusiastic, she loves participating in various sports and values a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i am a woman. i'm married. i'm a vegetarian. i enjoy sports such as running.
